about_the_game:
Original soundtrack of Devouring Stars. Including 19 tracks composed by Ryan Ike.
All tracks are provided as high quality MP3 and FLAC formats.

Tracklist


1. Aquamarine
2. Opal
3. Astral March
4. Destiny Map 1
5. Moonstone
6. Chrysoberyl
7. Celestial Fiction - Part A
8. Celestial Fiction - Part B
9. Destiny Map 2
10. Bloodstone
11. Topaz
12. Hematite
13. Destiny Map 3
14. Whispers In The Void
15. Coral
16. Onyx
17. Malachite
18. Destiny Map 4
19. Cosmic Waltz
